# Experimental Netting of Spring Herring
=============================================

**Project Title:** Experimental netting of spring herring using commercial style gillnets
**Project Number:** 30005453
**Project Type:** Request for Proposal

### Project Description

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking a contractor to conduct experimental netting of spring herring in the southern Gulf of St. Lawrence. The purpose of this project is to improve scientific knowledge of local spring herring populations and their relation to the global southern Gulf of St. Lawrence herring stock.

### Scope of Work

The work will be divided into five (5) regions:

* Region 1: 16B – Chaleur Bay, North side
* Region 2: 16B – Chaleur Bay, South side and Miscou
* Region 3: 16C – Escuminac
* Region 4: 16E – Cap-Pelé, Cape Jourimain and Prince Edward Island, South side
* Region 5: 16E – Prince Edward Island, North side

Bidders may submit an offer for one or multiple regions. Offers will be evaluated separately.

### Contract Term

The contract will be awarded for a period of 12 months, with options to renew for two (2) additional 1-year periods at the sole discretion of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada. The project will take place between March 15th and July 31st of each year.

### Conditionally Set-Aside

This tender is open, but it will be conditionally set-aside in favor of Indigenous businesses if two or more bids are received from Indigenous businesses certified under the Federal Government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) criteria listed in the Government of Canada's Indigenous Business Directory.

### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Marie-France Chrétien
* Contact Email: marie-france.chretien@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (451) 521-4448

# Tender Details
-------------------

* **Tender Closing Date:** March 5, 2024 at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 15, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** July 31, 2024
* **Regions of Operation:** New Brunswick, Gaspésie–Îles-de-la-Madeleine, Prince Edward Island
* **Regions of Delivery:** New Brunswick, Gaspés
